Desc.entry: Used for community and educational purposes. Hosts a dancing school, rainbows, brownies and guides, senior ladies exercise class, pre-school nursery and dog training club. Available for hire (see separate entry).

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 6-9pm (dog training club), Wed at 2-3.30pm (senior ladies exercise class), Thurs 6-9pm (Shirley Tindall School of Dancing), Fri at 7.30pm (Management Meetings, 4-6 times per year), Sat 9am-6pm (Shirley Tindall School of Dancing)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 17
